detectors.description: Random.number(uint256,uint256,uint256,address) (contracts/libraries/Random.sol#11-15) uses a weak PRNG: (value % max) + min (contracts/libraries/Random.sol#14)
FlipItGameV1.play(uint256,uint256) (contracts/FlipItGameV1.sol#130-168) uses a weak PRNG: win (contracts/FlipItGameV1.sol#165)
FlipItGameV1.play(uint256,uint256) (contracts/FlipItGameV1.sol#130-168) uses a weak PRNG: ! win (contracts/FlipItGameV1.sol#167)
FlipItGameV1.rewardIdsByGame(uint256) (contracts/FlipItGameV1.sol#209-211) uses a weak PRNG: games[gameId].rewardIds (contracts/FlipItGameV1.sol#210)
